content.raw: A small UI thing: it's difficult or impossible to right click on a joint to get the Joint Inspector when two links are very close together or overlapping, since right clicking will only select the link inspector. The workaround for this is to pull the links apart and open the Joint Inspector, but maybe something can be changed so that the joint hotspot can still open the Joint Inspector.
content.html: A small UI thing: it's difficult or impossible to right click on a joint to get the Joint Inspector when two links are very close together or overlapping, since right clicking will only select the link inspector. The workaround for this is to pull the links apart and open the Joint Inspector, but maybe something can be changed so that the joint hotspot can still open the Joint Inspector.
